song.title: Ever Be
song.lyrics:
[INTRO] .D Bm9 F#m G
[1] .D Em G Your love is devoted, like a ring of solid gold . F#m A D Like a vow that is tested, like a covenant of old || . Em G Your love is enduring, through the winter rain . F#m A G and beyond the horizon, with mercy for today
[P1] .G D A Faithful You have been, and faithful You will be . Em You pledge yourself to me, and it’s why I sing
[C] . G D Your praise will ever be on my lips . Ever be on my lips || . Bm A Your praise will ever be on my lips . Ever be on my lips
---
[2] .D You Father the orphan .Em G Your kindness makes us whole . F#m You shoulder our weakness, . A and Your strength becomes our own || .D You’re making me like You .Em G clothing me in white . F#m Bringing beauty from ashes . A For You will have Your bride
[P2] .G D A Free of all her guilt, and rid of all her shame . Em And known by her true name, and it’s why I sing
[B] .D A You will be praised, You will be praised .Bm With angels and saints . G D We sing worthy are You Lord || . Em You will be praised, You will be praised .Bm With angels and saints . G D We sing worthy are You Lord
